sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>POST Body</name><operation_script><![CDATA[/**
 * POST - Sample Request API - Body
 */
(function runOperation(/*RESTServiceRequest*/ request, /*RESTServiceResult*/ response) {
    var body = request.body.data;

    return {
        "body.id": body.id
    };
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/sn_demo_api/v1/example/body</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/body</relative_path><request_example>{"id":1234}</request_example><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Example operation that accesses the post body and returns it in response</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-07-10 05:18:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>19716f9fcb010200080cb967634c9c4a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>POST Body</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo API" source="sn_demo_api">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Demo API">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_19716f9fcb010200080cb967634c9c4a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 04:33:53</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Sample REST API">8ecfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce1</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">f9da3d27cb010200080cb967634c9c52</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

 * GET - Sample Request API - Script Include
 */
(function runOperation(/*RESTServiceRequest*/ request, /*RESTServiceResult*/ response) {
    var responseObj = sn_demo_api.SampleDataUtil.getSampleJSON();
    return responseObj;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/sn_demo_api/v1/example/scriptinclude</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/scriptinclude</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Example operation that retrieves respons content from a script include</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-07-10 15:05:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>46d7ed63cb010200080cb967634c9c2a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Script Include</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo API" source="sn_demo_api">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Demo API">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_46d7ed63cb010200080cb967634c9c2a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 04:33:22</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Sample REST API">8ecfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce1</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">f9da3d27cb010200080cb967634c9c52</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>POST String</name><operation_script><![CDATA[/**
 *  POST - Sample Request API - dataString
 *  sample usage:
 *  var requestBody = request.body;
 *  var requestString = requestBody.dataString;
 */
(function runOperation(/*RESTServiceRequest*/ request, /*RESTServiceResult*/ response) {
    var requestBody = request.body;
    var requestString = requestBody.dataString;
    return {"requestString": requestString};
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/sn_demo_api/v1/example/string</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/string</relative_path><request_example>thisisjustastring</request_example><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Example operation that showing posting just a string, accessing it via the ap</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-07-10 05:19:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c7b16f9fcb010200080cb967634c9c44</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>POST String</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo API" source="sn_demo_api">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Demo API">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_c7b16f9fcb010200080cb967634c9c44</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 04:33:48</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Sample REST API">8ecfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce1</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">f9da3d27cb010200080cb967634c9c52</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_37c0fde3cb010200080cb967634c9c05
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Custom JSON</name><operation_script><![CDATA[/**
 *  GET - Sample Request API - custom json
 */
(function runOperation(/*RESTServiceRequest*/ request, /*RESTServiceResult*/ response) {
    var requestBody = request.body;
    var writer = response.getStreamWriter();
    var hdrs = {};
    var samplejson = {"breweries":[{"name":"victory","beers":["Golden Monkey","Prima Pils"]},{"name":"Paulaner","beers":["Pils","Hefeweizen"]}]};
    var jsonstring = global.JSON.stringify(samplejson);
    hdrs['Content-Type'] = 'application/json';

    response.setStatus(200);
    response.setHeaders(hdrs);
    writer.writeString(jsonstring);
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/sn_demo_api/v1/example/customjson</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/customjson</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Example operation that returns a custom JSON response</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-07-10 15:44:22</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>37c0fde3cb010200080cb967634c9c05</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Custom JSON</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo API" source="sn_demo_api">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Demo API">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_37c0fde3cb010200080cb967634c9c05</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-07-10 20:04:25</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Sample REST API">8ecfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce1</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">f9da3d27cb010200080cb967634c9c52</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Incidents (not streaming)</name><operation_script><![CDATA[/**
 *  Sample Scripted REST Resource returns an array of custom JSON objects that include 2 incident properties.
 *  This sample uses ServiceNow JavaScript API to query incident records and then iterates
 *  over those records building a custom JSON object that includes 2 properties from the incident records.
 *  note that because we are returning a simple JSON object we can rely on built in serialization
 *  to set the content-type header as well as response status. The 'result_arr' object will not be returned
 *  until it has been completely built and stored
 */
(function runOperation(/*RESTServiceRequest*/ request, /*RESTServiceResult*/ response) {
    var table = 'incident',
        record_limit = 100,
        result_arr = [],
        gr = new GlideRecord(table);


    gr.setLimit(record_limit);
    gr.query();


    //  iterate over incident records and build JSON representations to be streamed out.
    while (gr.next()) {
        var incidentObj = {};

        incidentObj.number = gr.number + '';
        incidentObj.short_description = gr.short_description + '';

        result_arr.push(incidentObj);
    }

    return result_arr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/sn_demo_api/v1/example/incident</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>true</produces_customized><relative_path>/incident</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Example of streaming incident record information via a Scripted REST API</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-12-11 15:14:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7efea24d1398120005d1df173244b042</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Incidents (not streaming)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo API" source="sn_demo_api">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Demo API">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7efea24d1398120005d1df173244b042</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 15:14:30</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Sample REST API">8ecfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce1</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">f9da3d27cb010200080cb967634c9c52</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Text/Plain String</name><operation_script><![CDATA[/**
 *  GET - Sample Request API - plain text string
 */
(function runOperation(/*RESTServiceRequest*/ request, /*RESTServiceResult*/ response) {
    var requestBody = request.body;
    var writer = response.getStreamWriter();
	var hdrs = {};
	hdrs['Content-Type'] = 'text/plain';

	response.setStatus(200);
	response.setHeaders(hdrs);
	writer.writeString("plain text string");
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/sn_demo_api/v1/example/writestring</operation_uri><produces>text/plain</produces><produces_customized>true</produces_customized><relative_path>/writestring</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Example operation that returns custom content type as text/plain</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-07-10 14:20:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>45bd9163cb010200080cb967634c9c2c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Text/Plain String</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo API" source="sn_demo_api">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Demo API">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_45bd9163cb010200080cb967634c9c2c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 04:33:42</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Sample REST API">8ecfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce1</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">f9da3d27cb010200080cb967634c9c52</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_a83d660d1398120005d1df173244b078
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Incidents (streaming)</name><operation_script><![CDATA[/**
 *  Sample Scripted REST Resource returning custom JSON objects with properties from Incident Glide Records
 *  This sample uses ServiceNow JavaScript API to query incident records
 *  and then iterates over those records building and streaming a custom JSON object that includes some properties
 *  from the incidents
 */
(function runOperation(/*RESTServiceRequest*/ request, /*RESTServiceResult*/ response) {
    var writer = response.getStreamWriter(),
        hdrs = {},
        table = 'incident',
        record_limit = 100,
        gr = new GlideRecord(table);


    hdrs['Content-Type'] = 'application/json';
    response.setStatus(200);
    response.setHeaders(hdrs);

    gr.setLimit(record_limit);
    gr.query();

    //  start building response object
    writer.writeString("{\"stream results\":[");


    //  iterate over incident records and build JSON representations to be streamed out.
    while (gr.next()) {
        var incidentObj = {};

        incidentObj.number = gr.number + '';
        incidentObj.short_description = gr.short_description + '';
        writer.writeString(global.JSON.stringify(incidentObj));

        if (gr.hasNext()) {
            writer.writeString(",");
        }
    }

    //  close the response object
    writer.writeString("]}");
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/sn_demo_api/v1/example/incident_stream</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>true</produces_customized><relative_path>/incident_stream</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Example of streaming incident record information via a Scripted REST API</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-12-11 15:07:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a83d660d1398120005d1df173244b078</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Incidents (streaming)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo API" source="sn_demo_api">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Demo API">bebfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_a83d660d1398120005d1df173244b078</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 15:17:33</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Sample REST API">8ecfdb9fcb010200080cb967634c9ce1</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">f9da3d27cb010200080cb967634c9c52</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
